Uses of Class
org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.ConfigurationOptions

  • Packages that use ConfigurationOptions 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client
    Main package with all charts implementation, global classes and common interfaces.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration
    Contains all elements to configure a chart instance (know as chart options at instance level).
    org.pepstock.charba.client.geo
    Contains all classes to activate the GEO controllers (AKA chartjs-chart-geo.js ) for CHART.js.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts
    Contains METER and GAUGE charts implementations (based on controllers), available out-of-the box.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.matrix
    Contains all classes to activate the Matrix controller (AKA chartjs-chart-matrix.js) for CHART.js.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.sankey
    Contains all classes to activate the Sankey controller (AKA chartjs-chart-sankey.js ) for CHART.js.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.treemap
    Contains all classes to activate the TreeMap controller (AKA chartjs-chart-treemap.js ) for CHART.js.

    • Uses of ConfigurationOptions in org.pepstock.charba.client

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client that return ConfigurationOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ConfigurationOptions IsChart.getOptions()
      Returns the options of chart.

    • Uses of ConfigurationOptions in org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

      Subclasses of ConfigurationOptions in org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractPieOptions
      Abstract options for PIE chart.
      class  AreaOptions
      Specific options for AREA chart.
      class  BarOptions
      Specific options for BAR chart.
      class  BubbleOptions
      Specific options for BUBBLE chart.
      class  DoughnutOptions
      Specific options for DOUGHNUT chart.
      class  HorizontalBarOptions
      Specific options for HORIZONTAL BAR chart.
      class  LineOptions
      Specific options for LINE chart.
      class  PieOptions
      Specific options for PIE chart.
      class  PolarAreaOptions
      Specific options for POLAR AREA chart.
      class  RadarOptions
      Specific options for RADAR chart.
      class  ScalesOptions
      Configuration of chart with multiple scales.
      class  ScatterOptions
      Specific options for SCATTER chart.
      class  StackedBarOptions
      Configuration of chart which could be stacked.
      It uses Category axis for X axis and Linear for Y axis.
      class  StackedLineOptions
      Configuration of chart which could be stacked.
      It uses Category axis for X axis and Linear for Y axis.
      class  TimeSeriesBarOptions
      Specific options for BAR chart, for time series.
      class  TimeSeriesLineOptions
      Specific options for LINE chartfor time series.
      class  VerticalLineOptions
      Specific options for vertical LINE chart.
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration that return ConfigurationOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ConfigurationOptions RadarOptions.getOptions()  
      Constructors in org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration with parameters of type ConfigurationOptions 
      Constructor Description
      Elements​(ConfigurationOptions options)
      Builds the object storing the default root options.
      Interaction​(ConfigurationOptions options)
      Builds the object storing the root options element.
      Tooltips​(ConfigurationOptions options)
      Builds the object storing the chart instance and the root options element.
